title: Quick Sort
subject: Algorithms
theory:
Partition array around a pivot such that Left < Pivot < Right. 
Efficiency depends on Pivot choice. Random pivot avoids worst case O(n^2).

interview_questions.question: Hoare vs Lomuto partition?
interview_questions.answer: Hoare (two pointers from both ends) does fewer swaps and is generally faster than Lomuto (single direction).

real_world_use_cases.description: C++ `qsort`, Java `Arrays.sort` (primitives) use Quick Sort variants.
